title: 2 DAY GEN AI ENGINEERING MASTERMIND
fullDescription: Detailed overview of the 2-Day Gen AI Engineering Mastermind. This 12-hour intensive program covers API integration, building Gen AI agents, and more, with hands-on learning from top AI experts.
benefits: Master Gen AI in 12 hours, from API Integration to Building Gen AI Agents
Boost your engineering skills with hands-on learning
Learn from the Top 1% in AI
targetAudience: Tech Leaders (CTOs, Technical Product Managers, Tech Founders)
learningObjectives: Understand and utilize LLMs and OpenAI APIs effectively.
Master prompt engineering techniques for various engineering tasks.
Design and implement agentic AI workflows using frameworks like Crew AI.
Develop multi-agent AI systems for complex problem-solving.
Gain practical experience in integrating Gen AI into engineering projects.

modules.title: Module 1: LLMs, OpenAI APIs & Prompt Engineering
modules.content: Introduction to Large Language Models, practical usage of OpenAI APIs, and fundamental and advanced prompt engineering strategies tailored for engineers.

modules.title: Module 2: Agentic AI Workflow & Crew AI
modules.content: Exploring the concept of agentic AI, designing intelligent workflows, and a hands-on introduction to Crew AI for building autonomous AI agents.

modules.title: Module 3: Multi-Agent AI Systems
modules.content: Principles of multi-agent systems, communication and coordination between AI agents, and building complex systems with multiple interacting AI components.

sessions.session: Introduction to LLMs, OpenAI APIs & Prompt Engineering

mentors: KVS Dileep (Head of AI Initiatives, Outskill)
guarantee: Join for Free with no risk—massive value guaranteed!
certificateInfo: You will receive a certificate of completion to validate your learnings and practical application of GenAI concepts.
testimonials: Massive thanks to Prashanth, Phani, Manish

faqs.question: Is this Mastermind suitable for engineers new to Gen AI?
faqs.answer: Yes, the first day covers fundamentals of LLMs and prompt engineering. However, a basic understanding of software development concepts will be beneficial.

faqs.question: What practical skills will I gain?
faqs.answer: You will learn to integrate OpenAI APIs, build AI agents with Crew AI, and design multi-agent systems, equipping you with practical Gen AI engineering capabilities.
